SOG ventral unpaired median neuron.Comment: Disambiguation: the SOG ventral unpaired median neurons should not be confused with the 'VUM neurons'.
SOG ventral unpaired median neuron.Definition: Octopaminergic neuron (Sinakevitch and Strausfeld, 2006) whose cell body is located in a cluster around the ventral midline of the subesophageal ganglion (Tanaka et al., 2008).
